remarks: Division of both sides of 'less than or equal to' into a nonnegative number.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
rpred.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
rpaddcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
lediv2ad.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
lediv2ad.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ C ) $.
lediv2ad.5 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
lediv2ad $p |- ( ph -> ( C / B ) <_ ( C / A ) ) $.
